# 3 Mages (390): 40-90, Barre  (Myrridon: 13w3sw2s3wn)
#
#                     o          o   o
#                     |          +   +
#                     o    hazy+ o - o + o
#                     |     /    +   +
#          Shop - o - o--o+o     o   o
#                     |   /
#                     | RoS   o+o - o
#                     |         +   +
#                     |         o - o
#                     |         +   |
#     o - o +Fantus   o --- o + o   o
#     +   +           |         |   +
# o - o - o + o + o - o         +  Fount
# |                   |         | Evil Mage
# |       Pool        o         |
# o - o - Good        |         o - o + Neutral
#         Mage        |         +   +   Mage
#                     o   Henry+o - o
#                     |
#                o -- o -- o - o - o - o - o - o
#                |    |    |   |   |   |   |   |
#                o-Lahrohn-o - o - o - o - o - o     o   o-o
#                |    |    |   |   |   |   |   |     |   | |
#                o -- W -- o - o - o - o - D - o   o-U-o-o-o
#                |    |    |   |   |   |  /|   |     |   | |
#                o -- W -- W - W - o - o - o - o     o   o-o
#                |    |    |   |   |   |   |               |
#                o -- W -- W - W - o - o - o               o
#                |    |    |   |   |   |   |
#                o -- o -- W - W - W - o - o - o
#                |    |    |   |   |   |   |   |
#                o -- o -- o - o - o - o - o - o
#                |    |            |
#                o -- o            o
#                                  |
#                                  o
#                                  |
#                                  o
#                                  |
#                                  X
#                                  |
#                                 -o-
#
* Entrance alley, Burroughs and north houses are very bright.
* W: Skeletal Warriors in these rooms. Agg if you stay >5 seconds.
* Pool: Use "look <name>" to look at a player or mob (max your level, doesn't
*   work on no_where mobs)
* Fount: Full mana-restore & 1-3 ticks (75-225 s) paralyze
* RoS: Room of Summoning - Its special has been removed.
* hazy: A hazy vial pops on the floor (on boot only). When picked up, there's
*   approximately 80% risk of it exploding, damaging you (random percent of
*   current hp, so no risk of dying). If you succeed, you get the potion and
*   also another try, so you can get more than one potion in the same boot.

.Room of Summoning: Its special has been removed.
.  Each tick, if room has less than 10 mobs, there's a chance of a mob being
.  summoned.
.  Mobs of max lvl 30 are cloned exactly, including money but without eq.
.  Mobs of min lvl 100 get level/hp/money set to 1 and alignment set to
.  neutral. Skills, spells, specials, shrug, detect-invis & pop-on-death are
.  removed, but they keep their INFO-flag.
.  Only mobs of lvl 1-30 and lvl 100 mobs are summoned to this room, it seems.
.  Note: This room-special has been removed.

#                                            forest      f.path----forest

#  Pterod--bend                                          f.path

#         split----------ravine                          f.path

#         ravine       foot------------smaller---------pathTTforest

#         hole                      sw.path--inswamp-----inswamp--swamp <-\
#          /                           |        |     \     |        |    |
#        cave                       sw.path---still--> \-shallow--smelly  |
#         +                            |     shallow      lake    swamp   |
#         V       o----o            sw.path   lake          |        |    |
# o-> o---o-> o   |    |               |                 shallow----RIP   |

# o---m <-o---o---o--> m               |     /--o--o--o    lake           |

# o <-o---o---o   |  /-o       - - - - |- - -|- - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

# |   o---o   o----> o                 |     |             /|   RECALL

* Good (east) side can't be entered by good-aligned people

* S:  summonable.
* s:  Grey serpents (2)
* w:  Bloody wraiths (2)
* Gx: Guardian holding a key starting with the letter "x"
* Most evil guys (west side) are vuln pure/light/iron
* Most good guys (east side) are human (including the angels)

# Arachnos (63): 5-50, DikuMUD  (Karandras: 10wn3wswswn12ws3wu)
#
#                o <----------\
#               /|             \
#         o -- a o -------\     \
#         |   /            \    |
#     o - o -/       o-o   |    |
#         |          | |   |    /
#         o        o-o o - o --/   /-------> o
#         |            |   |      /          |
# o - o - X          o-o   v     /         _ v
#        /          /|     a     |        / \
#                  o o           o    d  o   \
#                   /           /    /       |
#                  o -- o ---- o     \---- base -----\
#                                            |       |
#                                            |       |
#                         base<- k --\ <- o -/ <- o -/
#      j --- o       i                |   |       |
#     /|    /|      /                 v   v       v
# base | ent. \--- i  <--- o -\ <---- o   d       k
#      |           |       |   |     /|
# o    |    base   |   j   v   v  basev
# |    |      |    |   ^   d   o      o
# o <-/   /-> h    |   |      /      /
# |      |    |    \-> o   base    base
# |      |    o          _
# |      |    |         / \
# |      |    o        |   |
# |      |    |        o   o
# |      |   RIP       ^   |
# |      |             |   v
#  \---> o ->base   /->o   o -> h
#       /|          |
#      /  \-------> o  o
#     |                +
#      \----> o -> o - o
#                 /
#              base
#

* FIND OUT: Map the maze
* FIND OUT: Supposedly 7x7 (or 10x10) square at bottom, 3x3 (or 6x6) at lvl 2 and ?x? at lvl 3.
* FIND OUT: Each level loops in all directions. Room 2n from entry has a bad exit south.
* FIND OUT: unenenun also works as path through the maze?
* FIND OUT: A huge boulder of glistening ice    elemental?
* FIND OUT: A githyanki protector               hp
* FIND OUT: A githyanki knight                  hp, money

#
#                                Mistress
#                                /   |
#                               x   prot
#                              o     +
#                             x     warl
#                         Torture    |
#                         Master    warl    warl
#                                    +       +
#                        o       o - o - o - o
#                        +       |       +   |
#                        o - o + o + o   o   o + o    /--\
#                        +       |           |   |   |    |
#                    githzerai   |       o   o   o + o    |
#                                |       +   |   |   |    |
#                                o + o + o - o + o    \--/
#                                    +
#                                    o                        .
#                                  |/                        .
#                                - o -                        .
#                                 /|                        .
#                              |   |                        .
#                            - o - o -                        .
#                              |   |                          .
#                          |   |                             .
#                        - o - o -                            .
#                          |   |                              .
#                          |/                                .
#                        - o -                                .
#                         /|                                 .
#                        /                                   .
#                       /                                   .
#                     |/  |                                  .
#                   - o - o -                                 .
#                    /|   |      |               |            .
#                         |     -o-            - o -          .
#                         |      |   |           |    |/     .
#                       - o ---- o - o -       - o -- o -     .
#                         |      |\  |     |     |   /|      .
#                                | \     - o --- o -          .
#                          |    /  |       |     |            .
#                         -o------ |       |     |             .
#                          |       |       |     |               .
#                                  |       |     |                 .
#                      |     |     |       |     |     |     |        .
#                    - o --- o --- o ----- o --- o --- o --- o -         .
#                      |     |     |       |     |     |     |          .
#                      |     |     |       |     |     |     |          .
#           |     |    |     |     |       |     |     |     |   |      .
#         - o --- o -- o --- o ----o------ o --- o --- o --- o - o -    .
#           |     |    |     |     | \     |     |     |     |   |      .
#           |     |    |     |     |  *    |     |   - o -            .
#           |     |    |     |     |   X   |     |     |            .
#           |     |    |     |     |  /|   |     |                .
#           |     |    |     |     |       |     |                .
#         - o --- o -- o --- o --- o ----- o --- o -            .
#           |     |    |     |     |       |     |            .
#                      |     |     |       |     |         .
#                     -o-   -o --- o ----- o --- o -       .
#                      |     |     |       |     |        .
#
* Messy maze with loads of aggressive mobs.
* Entrance to Giths: 2nwnwunenenun
* large floating mass - electricity, glowing celestial particles - dark
* warlock - magic, githzerai - unlife, dragon - slay dragon
* Torture Master - pure/light/silver/wood, vampiric bat - ONLY area spells!

* Min level 0/44 (Alterac)
* T = Room filled with hot tar (works like lava room). All exits lead back to T
* t = Room hurts you with hot tar (119/500? dam) (mirror image protects)
* a = Room hurts you with arrows (74/154? dam)
* b = Room hurts you with boulders (371/753? dam)
* f = Room hurts you with flaming arrows (156?/500?/1007? dam)
* m = Room hurts you with ballista missiles (532? dam)
* c = nocop
* r = norecall
* n = noflee
* p = tunnel room (max 1 player)
* z = Going that dir hurts you with razor sharp thorns (35? dam)  (not sure if it's exit or entrance room)
* Dangerous area!!!

#

#                                   o   o - o - o
#                                   |
#                            o--\   o   /----o
#                           /   |   +   |   /
#                          o----|---o---|--o
#                               |   |   |
#                               \---f---/
#                                  /|
#                                SC |
#                                   |
#           o-------------------o-o-|-o
#          /                   /    |/
#         x   o   o   o       o--+--o---o
#        /    +   +   +      x     /
# o-o-o-o-----o---w---w+o   v     o
#       |     +   +   +     o
#     o+o+o   o   o   o         
#       +             +
#       o             o*->Drakyri
#
* Entrance is "A large travelling fair" that moves around between 5 locations.
* One round in approx 43 hours (54 rl mins). Waits 7.6 hours (9.5 rl mins) in
* each town. When moving it can't be entered.
*    1: n3wswswn3w4ne4ne3ne2nwne2nes2e2n3e                   [Kerofk-s4w]
*    2: 3w2s2wnw2swse2se2nw3ne2ne2n2es2eses2es2ene2ne2nwne3n [Sundhaven-7s]
*    3: 3swse2sw2s2en3en3enenene2se3se2swse2se2swses3wn...
*       3ws2ws8w5s3ws2es2esese2se2ses2es3e4sw                [Ofcol-4sw]
*    4: e4n3wnwswsws2ws2ws2wn2ws3w2se2sdw                    [Solace-7s]
*    5: eu2nw4nw2nw2ne2nwnw2ne4n9w5nw                        [Karandras-7w]
* w: "look" in this room will show location of circus.
* SC: The Ringmaster's shortcut (cannot be entered).

# o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o               o                       o
# |                               |              /                       /
# o                 o - U - o     o             o                       o

# o                 o - o - o     o           o         Lvl 2         o
# |                 |       |     |           |                       |
# o                RIP  U   o     o           o   o   o +UD   o - o   o
# |                     |         |           |   |       |   |   |   |
# o             U - o - o - o - U o           o   o - o   o + o - o   o
# |                     |         |           |   |   |   |   |   |   |
# o                 U - o - U     o           o   o - o + o   o - o   o
# |                     +         |           |           |           |
# o                     X         o       o   D   o - o + D + o       D   o
# |                     |         |        \  |                       |  /
# o                     o -       o         o o                       o o
# |                    /          |          \|                       |/
# o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o           o - o - D - o - D - o - o
#
#       Lvl 3                    Lvl 4
# o - o +UD + o - o        o -GM  UD MoA - o           o   Lvl 5       o
# |   |   |                +       |       +          /               /
# o - o   o + o - o        o + o   o   o - o         o   o - D - o   o
#         |       +        +       +   +             |   |   |   |   |
# o - o - o + o   o        o - o - o - o - o         o - o - o - o - o
#     |   |                |   |   |   |   |         |   |       |   |
# o - o   o + o - o        o - o - o - o - o       o o - o   o   o - o o
#         +                        +                \|   |   +   |   |/
#     o - o - o                    o                 o   o - o - o   o
#
* Almost all are vuln slay human.
* Lvl 4 (templar part) has min level 0/2-0/37

#
#   o - o   o - o         o                     /        o - o  Lvl 8
#   |   |   |   |         |         Lvl 5-7    o         |   |
#   o - o   o - o         o                   /      o - o - o - o
#   +       +    /        |        o - o   o o       |   |  /|   |
#   o - o - o - o Lvl 4   o        |   |   +/        o - o - o - o
#   +       +  /          |    Gunthar-o - o             |   |
#   o - o   o - o         o        |   |  /+             o - o
#   |   |   |   |         |        o - o   o
#   o - o   o - o         o
#                         |
#   o   o   o   o         o                   o - o - o   o
#   +   +   +   +         |                   +       +   +
#   o - o - o - o       o-|-o - o + o         o - o - o - o
#   +   +   +   |       | |x|   |   |         +       +   |
#   o   o   o   |       | o |   |   o         o - o - o   |
#               |/      |   |   |                         |/
#      Lvl 1    o       o - o - o               Lvl 3     o
#              /|       |                                /|
#   o   o   o   |       |   Lvl 2             o - o - o   |
#   +   +   +   |       |            /        +       +   |
#   o - o - o - o       o - o - o - o         o - o - o - o
#   +   +   +   +       |   |   |  /|         +       +   +
#   o   o   o   o       o - o - o - o         o - o - o   o
#
#             o ----------------- o ----------------- o
#             |       o - o - o       o - o - o       |
#             |       |   |   |       |   |   |       |
#         o - o   o - o - o - o       o - o - o - o   o - o
#         |       |    training        temple     |       |
#     o - o   o - o   o - o - o       o - o - o   o - o   o - o
#     |       |       |   |   |       |   |   |       |       |
# o - o   o - o       o - o - o       o - o - o       o - o   o - o
# |       |               +               +               |       |
# |   o - o               o - o       o - o               o - o   o
# |   |   |  armory       |   |       |   |      stables  |   |  /|
# o   b - o   o - o   o - o - o       o - o - o   o   o   o - o / |
# |\  |   |   |   |   |   |               |   |   |   |   |   |/  |
# | \ o - o   o - o + o - Q      sky      o - o + o - o   o - o   |
# |  \|   |   |   |   |   |               |   |   |   |   |   |   |
# |   o - o   o - o   o - o               o - o   o   o   o - o   |
# |   |   |           |   |        /      |   |           |   |   |
# |   o - o       o + o - o ----stand---- o-> a + o       o - o   |
# |   |   |       |   |   |      /|       |   |   |       |   |   |
# |   o - o   o - o   o - o - o - o - o - o - o   o - o   o - o   |
# |   |   |   |       |       |   |   |       |       |   |   |   |
# |   o - o   o   o - o   o + o - o - o + o   o - o   o   o->/o   |
# |       |       |       |   +   |   +   |       |       |  |    |
# o - o   o - o <-o   o - o   o   o   o   o - o   o-> o - o  |    |
#     |       |   |           |   |   |           |   | \    /    |
#     o - o   o - o           o   o   o           o - o  -<--     |
#         |   |   |               |               |   |           |
#         |   o   o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o   o       o - o
#         |   |       |   |/  |   |   |   |/  |/      |       |
#         |   o - o   o - U - o - o - o - U - o   o - o   o - o
#         |       |               |               |       |
#         o - o   o - o - o - o - X - o - o - o - o   o - o
#             |                   |                   |
#             o --------- D - o --|------ D --------- o
#                        /        |      /
#                                 |
#                             /
#      Derek - 2 - 2        -o-
#        |     |   |        /|
#      Sturm - 1 - 1 + g - o   Cellar
#        |     |   |
#      Alfred- 2 - 2
#
* Whole area is very bright (check battlements)
* a: Going west takes you 3 steps north.
* b: Going south takes you 2 steps south.
* g: Evil-aligned people cannot go west from this room.
* sky: No-exit room where Skye and his friends are
* Place Sleet's Dragon Orb in Stand to summon Skye + 2-3 Crazed blue dragons

#           M o+o        o Jaix  |    |  /-<--o--o               v
#           + |          |   +   |    |  |    |         b - o -- b
#   +       o-o-o        o - o - o    |  |    v         |
#   X       | | |        |            |  |    /---\     o + b -- b
#   |       o o o        o - o + o    |  |    |   v         |    |
# Q+o-o+o   |   |                |    o-------o---o     b-GMoDF->o
#     |     o-o-o    Fence+o-o   |       | /  |   |      (hinge)

#            D ----- ? ----- D          |   |                .
#           /|       |      /|      ? - ? - ?                .
#          nosum   nosum     ?      |       |               .
#            |       |       |  ? - ? - ?   ? - -          .
#            ?       ?       ?  |       |                 .
#            |      /        |  ? - ? - ?                .
#            |     B   ______|_____/        inside      .
#            |        /      |                ??        .
#            D ----- ? ----- D               worm       .
#           /               /                          .
#                                                     .
#                                                    .
#             /               /                     .
#          ?-U     ?       ?-U                     .
#          |       |       |                       .
#          ? - ? - ? - ? - ?                       .
#                  |                  .
#               ?-GrN  ?               .
#               |  |   |    /         .
#             ?-?  ? - ? - U          .
#          /  |    |                 .
#         U - ?    ?                 .
#                                                 .
#                                                 .
* Careful! There might be several aggressive, huge worms just outside the
* entrance, if they've been disturbed. And standing there will attract more.
* Entry room is tunnel room - max 1(?) player, so if you walk in with a group,
* the rest might get stuck in the nasty attract-worm room.
* In some?/most? of the rooms you can trapdoor to "Grub Nest" at the bottom.
* Whole bottom level (plus breeding chamber) is norecall? Whole next level too?
* GrN: Grub Nest. wswsw room is recallable, nwwne too. Rest i don't know.
* C: A strange corner. Might create new mobs (need to check more)
*    'A hidden entrance opens, and A monstrous centipede arrives.'
* B: The breeding chamber. Primeval Worm and tons of cocoons?
* SpT: Spider trap: 3 trap spiders
* Electricity seems to be good on the worms. Immunity to earth?

A ghostly bilge-rat wails as it approaches you. (invisible)
1: You pulverize A ghostly bilge-rat with your pierce (70-90).

This careless mariner died from alcohol poisoning rather than a shipwreck. (invisible)
5: You vaporize A haunted grog-fiend with your pierce (57-69).

A spectral pirate (invisible) is here, fighting Jane.
You rush to attack A spectral pirate!

A white ambience surrounds this mutineer. (invisible)
2: You vaporize The dead mutineer with your pierce (57-69).

The apparition of a shipwrecked buccaneer roams the cove. (invisible)
A phantasmal buccaneer pulverizes you with its hit.

The spirit of a dead sailor haunts the wreckage of his vessel. (invisible)
5: You vaporize A revenant sailor with your pierce (57-69).

Jane digs up sand.
Jane has found a half-rotten cloth sack full of gold coins buried here.
Jane splits 1000000 coins among your group.  You receive 90909 of them.

A deceased mariner haunts the cove here. (invisible)
1: You vaporize A phantom mariner with your pierce (57-69).

The ugly wight of a long-dead seafarer hovers here. (invisible)

* tuk = Tomb of the Unknown King

#
#                    o
#                   x
#         o <-*o <-/
#         |
#     o   X   o        o - o - o
#     |   |   |            |
# o - o - o - o <- o - o - o - o
#     |   |   |            |
#     o   o   o        o - o - o
#         |                ^
#         o                |
#         |                o
#         v                |
#     o - o - o        o   o   o
#         |            |   |   |
#     o - o - o - o -> o - o - o
#         |            |   |   |
#     o - o - o        o   o   o
#

* Many/all rooms can hurt you with lightning (-30 hp) & soul consuming.
* Dracolich, Wyrm & Skeletal dragon are vuln slay dragon
* Attendants are vuln unlife

* Entrance from Circus. Most rooms are very bright.
* Most named mobs have walk-paths.
* Drakyris are elves, but some resist dark/unlife. All are vuln iron.
* Reykaris-area is agg-good. Myrxes-area is agg-all?
* Shield, Flame and probably the others can teleport to a member of "their"(?)
*   house that is under attack, and admonish the attacker (without attacking)
* Shadow - iron/unlife/dark
* Flame  - iron/unlife/dark/ice    Dyrli
* Hand   - fire/iron/energy
* Shield - iron/unlife/dark        Deis
* Claw   - pure/light/iron
* Fist   - iron/unlife/dark
* Master - normal

* Min level 0/32 (Anhara's house)
* Whole area is very bright
* All drows are immune to pure/light/ice(?) No vulns(?) Careful with Anhara.

* Normal drow-elf irvs should be: Vuln Pure/Light/Ice, Resist Unlife/Dark/Magic

* Min level > 0/43
* Same area as Dragons Graveyard
* Many rooms are very bright

*      draconians and bodyguards will gather there, making the rest of the
*      area a lot safer (and the east part really nasty).

*  1 pm: 50% chance of Mr Toad coming back to the look-out.
* 10 pm: If Mr Toad is in the look-out, it's 50% chance of him going home.

* FIND OUT: The Efreeti             hp
* FIND OUT: The Death Knight        hp (approx)
* FIND OUT: a shoe: Dissolves?
#
#                            Medusa
#                              +
#                 j o------o---o
#                /+ +     /
#               o o-o    o  o-----------------------o
#        ->t   /         |  |                       |
#       /     o         /|  |                 o     |
#      b     /         | |  |                 |     |
#      ^    o-o<-\     o-o  |               o-o-o o-o
#      |      +  |       +  | |             |  /  | |
#     /       v  |  o    k--o X    o        o o---o |
#  sword      o  |  +       |x     |                |
# master     x   |  o ----- G--o---o----------------o
#    | -<---/    |  |       |      |        o-o     |
#    |/          |  o-o     |    o---o      | |     o
#  /-o-o         |  |       |   x  | |      o o-o<-/
#  \_____________/  o---o---t  p   | o      |
#                   |      x|      |/       o
#                   o   Pit |      o       /
#                   +       v        /--> m <-\
#                   \--->Hedges     /     |   |
#                                  /      m   |
#                          _______/       |   |
#                         /               o   |
#                        /   Pit          |   |
#                        \    ^           o   |
#                         \   |           |   |
#                          \--o-> b <+o-o-o - o
#                            /| \             |
#                        Home v  \-----o      o
#                             p        ^      |
#                                      o <--- o -> b
#                                             |
#                                             v
#                                            Pit
#
* m                : Lots of aggressive Maedars
* Pit              : Exits in all dirs, leading to "Isn't this fun!??".
* Isn't this fun!??: Exits in all dirs, leading back to "Isn't this fun!??".
* OUT              : Back to the entrance room
*
* Hedges: (w-d-n-e to get to the wrinkle)
#                            5
#                            ^  _
#                            | / \   ____
#          Pit            /--4---/  /    \
#           ^             | x|      |    |
#           | G           |/  \---Hedges-|---\ <--------\
#           |/            /  ^      |    |   |           \
# Hedges <- p -> Wrinkle /|  |      \____/ <-3----> OUT  |\
#           |           / |  |      ^        | |\        | \
#           | G        /  \__|______|________/ | \       |  \
#           |/        /      |      \----------5-/       |   \
#           o <-------\      |                 |         |   |
#           |          \     |                 \---------o-\ |
#           v           \    |                          x| | |
#          OUT           \___|_________________________/ \_|_/
#                            |                             |
#                            \_____________________________/
#
* Wrinkle:
#                      OUT p
#                        |/
#           Hedges <- Wrinkle -> Hedges
#                       /|
#                      /LoB
#                     /
#                 j<-o->k
#
* Labyrinth of Bodies (no magic area. 2e2swes to get to room 9):
*
# Nr  n  s  e  w                             RIP b
#  1  2  2  2  1                /-> b          |/
#  2  1  2  3  2               x           o - o
#  3  2  4  1  4              o            ^
#  4  3  5  2  1             /      Pit <- o - o
#  5  1  3  4  6            o   ______________/
#  6  6  6  7  8            |  /
#  7 Pit 9  p  4            o x
#  8  1  8  3  3            |/
#  9  See below      LoB(1) o
#                        ^ /
#                        |/
#              LoB(1) <- o -> LoB(4)
#                       /|\_________________
#                    RIP |                  \
#                        v                  |
#                       LoB(3)    Medusa <- 9 - LoB(1)
#                                           |
#                                          OUT
#
* Min level 0/30
* Nasty place with lots of aggies, confusing rooms and DT:s

# FIXME: AN OWN MAP!
* Note: Lady Nyraan and Rowlik are PG mobs, beware!
* Note: Entrence through Mushroom forest
* Note: First part with wizarns are good exp area
* Note: part north of ElW contains multiple aggro elder wizarn, can be several in same room.
* Note: Some mobs (animated dragons/skeletons? can wipe stuff from inventory
* Note: a lot of aggro mobs, Bring a BIG group, except for first wizarn/wizarne part.
* 
* X = First room 
* apo = Apothecary
* cre = Charred room of enchantment (2x AGGRO, Pale-skinned burned?...)
* ElW = Elder wizarn here and in the area to the north, AGGRO, can be multiple in same room
* gtf = Gateway to the farm (Something buried here, a discarded letter)
* gwv = Glowing white void, white orb of essence here, AGGRO, room is no summon out, recall works
* mss = Mansion secret storage (wooden chest with cash in it) key from apprentice summoner east from here
* rer = Rune Enchanting Room (2x AGGRO, Pale-skinned enchantress)
*
* <<< MOBS >>>
* Wizarn & Wizarne          good exp group mobs
* Acolyte                   good exp group mobs
* Pale-skinned enchantress  Aggro, easy exp group mobs (2 of them in room rer)
* Pale-skinned enchanter    Aggro, easy exp group mobs (2 of them in room cre)
* Apprentice summoner       Aggro, has key to mss, stands in room east from mss.
* Elder wizarn              Aggro, cast hell storm, can be 3 (or more) in same room, can get though.
* Spectral wraith           Aggro towards visible ppl?, can murder people, walks around in the fields east of gtf
* Graven walking corpse     Aggro, easy with exp group, walks around in the fields east of gtf
* White orb of essence      Aggro, cast wrath of god, heals it self, not whole group entered room, why?
*
*
* <<< LETTER FROM Cassandra (a discarded letter) >>>
* My dearest love,
* Lady Nyraan has summoned all of our dead from the cemetary.  All of the farm
* animals have been slaughtered.  Scavengers have come and eaten the corpses of
* our wildstock...even Bessy.  She's gone my love, she's gone.  What can we 
* live for anymore?  Our farm is completely destroyed by the dark magics.  The
* mansion was always a front for the evil that Lady Nyraan was really up to. 
* How could we have never seen it?  I am headed to Myrridon to see if I can
* recruit some adventurers to clear these fields and rid us of Lady Nyraan once
* and for all. Please don't reveal to Lady Nyraan that we are aware of her
* evil deeds until I return!
*                                                 Love Always,
*                                                      Cassandra

* guards or how does it work there? Next time Zoebri (evil) was attacked by
* the top 3 (out of 5) royal guards, plus golem.

* Quite safe area, as long as you don't stray off into March or Amphitheatre
* Careful with the fire elementals by the castle entrance (eq-vape risk)

# High Tower of Sorcery (130): 30-100, Skylar  (High Tower: -)

*     n  s  e  w
*  1: 3  -  4  2
*  2: 2  1  3  4
*  3: 1  5  2  4
*  4: 4  1  2  3       |
*  5: 3  6  2  4     - 1 -
*  6: 5  7  6  1       ^
*  7: 6  8  9 10       |      From entrance: nnsssws -> HT
*  8: 9  6  8  1       X -
*  9: 5  8  4  9
* 10: 7 11 10  3
* 11:HT  4  7 11
*
* Entrance from the Shadow Grove. Whole area is very bright.
* Area does not pop with players in it.
* Interesting area with lots of different NPC:s - most of them human.
* Explore carefully - some aggressive mobs are high-level.

#            o - o   o - U - o -- D - U   U - D - o - U - o - U * Fishing

#            o   D - o - o - o-D  o   o - o   o   o - D   o   o-o
#            |       |   |   |    /   |       |   |   |   |   |
#     ------ X - U - o   U   U - U -- o - U - o   o   o - U   o

#            |   o   |   |                    /------/|   o - o

#            D   o   o - o - o  o-o   o - o - o - o - U   o  /o

#            o - o   D   o - o -- o   o - o   U   o - o - o - o
#                |   |       |        |       |   |       |
#            D - o   o - o - U ->-/D- o - o   o - o - o   o - o

#            U   D - o   o - o-o---o-o    o - D   o - o - o - o

#        o - o-- o-/-o - o   o - o -- U   o - o - U   o   o

#                |   |       |        |   |       |   |   |   |

#            o - U   o - o   o   o -- o   o - o - o - o - o   o

#            o - o   o   o   o - o - o -> o - o - o - o - o - o

#            o   o - o   o - o   U   o -- o - o - o - o - o - o

* Very few aggies. Safe lowbie area

# Icewood Vale (?): 1-100, Stryder (?/?-?min)  (Stormhaven: s4wdwsw, or Stormhaven: 2n2w7n, open gate west, 2wnwn2d)
* FIND OUT: LOADS!
#
#                           /
#                          o (Stormhaven)
#                         /
#                  o     Xn
#                  |    /
#                  o - i?
#                      |
#                      o - o
#                      |   |
#                 sid--o  abs
#                      |
#      i   wc--o       o            o
#      |       |      /            /
#      o - o - o o   o        o - o
#      |       |\|   |        |   |
#  o - o       o o - o -- o - o - o
#                    |        | o - o
#                    |        |/|
#         o          o -- o - i |
#         |          |    |  o--i
#         o - o------|--o o  |
#             |   o  | /|    |
#             v   |  |/ o -- o - o
#           - o   o--o           |
#       (A-R) |                  |        / (Stormhaven)
#             o - o ----------o<-o   o - o
#                 |           |  |   |
#                             |  Xs--o
#                             | /    |
#                             |/
#                           - o
#                             |
#
# FIXME: AN OWN MAP!
# Note: Firbolg and giants (info mobs), maybe mammoths too are nice exp
# Note: some aggressive Ice Worms (not that dangerous)
* i = Ice Worm(s) in these rooms, might be more than 1, aggressive.
* Xn = First room (if walked north from Stormhaven)
* Xs = First room (if walked south from Stormhaven)
* (A-R) = Ashinara - Rivers
* abs = Abandoned structures (abandoned backpack here also)
* sid = Sealed entrance to an Ice diamond mine
* wc = Winter cemetery
* Same area as Desolate Steppes and Azure Lake
* Area is...?
* Other useful info...?

http://www.lysator.liu.se/~tomca/maps/1a_info.txt

Map file contents:
==================
Area name: <name> (number): <levels>, <creator> (<poptime-unvisited>/<poptime-visited>)  (<speedie>)
Find out:  Things in the area that still needs to be found out
Map:       The map
Area info: Special information about the area
           Min level 20:   You must be at least lvl 20 to enter
           Min level 0/20: You must be at least lvl 20 or multi to enter
           Min level 50/20: You must be at least lvl 20 multi to enter
           Max level 20:   You can not enter if above level 20
           Max level 0/20: You can not enter if above level 20 or multi
           Max level 50/20: You can not enter if above level 20 multi
Mobs:      Mobs in the area


Map info:
=========
X   Entry point
o   room
-   east-west exit
|   north-south exit
/   up-down exit
+   door (east-west or north-south)
x   door (up-down)
->  one-way exit
RIP Death Trap
WM  Wild Magic
NM  No Magic
U   Up exit. Connected to a...
D   Down exit (usually used when an area has several larger floors)
Q   Quest master
M   Mirror - entrance to Mirror Beyond
C   Carriage stop
w   Water room (only used on the OC map to show rivers)

Mob info:
=========
Sorting: Level first, then name
Name: as seen in "<name> is in excellent condition."
Lvl: Level
Xp:  Mob Xp (see explanation below)
A: Alignment     G/N/E
S: Sanced        x/-
W: Walking       x/-
I: see Invis     x/-
D: see Darkness  x/-
M: Memory        x/-
X: Switch        0/1/2/... (max normal switches in a round)
#: Number        MAX number of mobs of that type
Agg: Aggie       G/-, N/-, E/-. Example: "G-E" means aggressive against good & evil chars.
Hp: Hit points   <lowest hp seen>-<highest hp seen>. This is the mob's max-hp (the ones inside paranthesis when he does a "ps"). A "~" before the sum means hp has been calculated by killing and looking at total damage (ie, some healing-time may be included).
gold:            <lowest amount found>-<highest amount found>
special:         Miscellaneous useful information about the mob (see list below).

Mob XP:
=======
I don't have access to the code, so this is just my guess on how xp works. And
it seems to work like this:

XP gained = <mob xp> / <your level>
IF you are multi, divide XP by 3
If your level >= 65, divide XP by 4
IF your level > mob level AND your level > 50, lower XP by 1/3
IF mob is withered, lower XP by 1/3
IF you are in a group, the <mob xp> should be divided by by the highest level
   in the group (not with <your level>).
   And then you also have to multiply with your percentage (5% means *0.05).
IF you are templar, xp might be different for different mob aligns, but the
   numbers for this is unknown to me. And it looks like Templars do get the
   exact same xp as other classes.

So, the xp listed is what a single-classed lvl 1 non-templar would get for
killing the mob solo, without using wither. Since xp is only given in whole
numbers and I'll need calculations to get the original xp, there will be
some rounding errors - don't expect the values to be exact. I'm adding k/M/B
to the end, cutting the number to max 4 digits.

My guess is that you will get the actual xp the mob has (only visible by imm-
stat:ing the mob) by dividing this xp with the mob's level. But this is just
speculation.

When in groups, your share is shown correctly in the group listing, _except_
if the group contains pets. (have not bothered checking if charmies work or
not).
Mob xp is set by the creator, but it seems to go (VERY vaguely) around the
formula: Lvl^4*5

100  11000000



Mob thac-X=11:
==============
Means that the mob has to roll at least 11 on a 20 sided dice to manage to
hit you if you have armor class -X.
So if you have -X in armor class, the mob will hit you 50% of the times.
Each step difference from this -X armor class means a 5% change in the mob's
chance to hit you, so if you are more than 8 steps from -X, the mob will have
5% or 95% chance to hit you.

Mob AC:
=======
Your chance of hitting the mob depends on his armor class (ac) compared with
your ability to hit him (thac0 modified by hr).
thac0 4 means you must roll at least 4 on a 20 sided dice to manage to hit
him, if he has armor class 0. Each hr you get lowers the number needed by 1,
and each step downwards in ac the mob gets, raises the number by one.
So to calculate a mob's ac, take your thac0 minus your hitroll, minus your
miss-percentage divided by 5, minus 1.
Example:
Thac0 -7 and hr +43  =>  thac0 -50
146 misses out of 175 (83.4%): 85/5 + 1 = 18 (must roll at least 18 on a d20)
-50-18 = -68, so mob has AC -68
Note: You always have min 5% and max 95% hitchance, so calculationg ac is only
reliable if you are within the 10%-90% range.
SIMPLY PUT: Skip the signs. If your HR+thac0 = mob AC, you will always hit.
            Each step below means 5% less chance.

Mob Save:
=========
Save X = Roll X or higher on a d20 to make a successful save.
Save 11 means the mob has 50% chance to save against your spell.
Save 2 gives 95% save against spells. Each step in save changes your chance
of saving with 5%. The level of the spell/caster does not alter this chance.
The chance of saving a spell is never below 5% and never above 95%.
Save <2 means you have max even if cursed.
Default?:  lvl   save
          1-19     ?
          20-25   15
          26-30    ?
           31     12
           32      ?
           33     11
           34      ?
          35-37   10
          38-42    7
          43-44    ?
          45-47    5
          48-99    ?
          100     <2

Special:
========
INFO, questmaster, [creaturetype]/shopkeeper/guildmaster/no-attack/nofight-room,
vuln xxx[heal], immune xxx, resist xxx, SUMMONER, can VAPE eq/<type>!,
 xxx damage, summoned, assist-equals,
sleeping/sitting, protector, shrugger, blocker, parry, dodge, parry/dodge,
[X-Y] backstab [(nosanc-dam)], bash, kick, headbang, berserk,
(fire|gas|lightning|acid...) breath, [area] <spell>, X-Y spells, X-Y attacks,
xxx/yy dam per attack, negate sanc xx/yy times (zz%), +X coins,
(random-)(delayed-)agg-(G?E|<align>|all|sleeper), X-Y skills,
pulsing-areadamage, flees, cake,
switch (X), no-charm (= thief?), walk-path, no-summon,
no-where, hunt, revenger, looter, corpse taker/eater, (no)switch, hide,
imp/invis, summon <mob>, no-group, forceflee, avgdam X, AC X,
thac-X 11, save X, special-code[<comment>], +<nr> starthp, sneak, ignore-cop,
aware, water-living, mountable, corpseless (= insubstantial?),
room/area is nomag/wildmag/noflee/norecall/nosum/nosumout
  but fleeable/recallable/sumout
Note: Walk-path, hunt & revenger means they ignore cop!
      Undeads, vampires & mobs with shadowform are automatically no-group
      parry/dodge means parry if mob is wielding a weapon, dodge otherwise.
                  Might be that all mobs have just a parry/dodge skill and
                  the action depends on whether they wield a weapon or not.
                  Addendum: Coven High-Priestess can do both, but dodged in
                    last battle even though she had an athame.
                    Zandy dodged when having spear - hass parried earlier.
                    Lurk dodged when having Skaven. Can he parry?
                  Maybe it's just random?

[creaturetype]:
===============
Used if mob is vuln to a certain slay damage. He is then expected to have the
default irv:s of that creaturetype too. Any deviations from those irv:s are
listed after [creaturetype].
Below is a list of known creatures and their default irv:s (gnome PC:s are
also resistant to earth):
Type           Vulns                    Resists                   Immunities
Amphibian      ---                      Water                     ---
Animal         Mental/Gas               Earth                     ---
Astral         Pure/Light/Unlife/Dark   ---                       ---
Beholder       Light                    Dark/Magic                ---
Bird           Air                      ---                       Earth
Botanic        Acid                     ---                  Air/Gas/Light/Dark
Canine         Mental                   Dark                      ---
Demon          Pure/Light/Iron          Dark/Unlife/Poison        Fire
Devil          Pure/Light/Iron          Dark/Unlife/Poison        Fire
Dinosaur       Fire                     ---                       ---
Dragon         ---                      Fire/Ice/Earth/Air/Gas    ---
Drow-Elf       Pure/Light/Ice           Unlife/Dark/Magic         ---
Dwarf          SLarge/Water/Magic       Fire/Earth/Poison         ---
Elemental      ---                      ???                       ---
Elf            Unlife/Dark/Iron         Magic/Light/Pure          ---
Entity         ---                      Fire/Ice/Unlife/Earth/Air ---
Fairie         Dark/Unlife              Magic                     Pure/Light
Feline         Mental                   Dark                      ---
Fish           ---                      ---                       Water
Giant          ---                      Crush/Large/SLarge/Poison ---
Gnome          Large/SLarge             Mental                    ---
Goblin         Fire/Large/SLarge/Light  Dark/Gas/Poison           ---
Half-Elf       Unlife                   Light                     ---
Half-Orc       Light                    Dark                      ---
Hobbit         Large/SLarge/Air/Gas     Unlife/Poison/Mental      ---
Human          ---                      ---                       ---
Insect         Gas                      ---                       ---
Insubstantial  Energy                   Weapon                    Unlife
Jelly          ---                      Weapon                    ---
Ktv            ---                      Gas/Poison/Energy/Mental  ---
Lizardman      Fire/Ice                 Electricity/Water         ---
Lugroki        Pure/Light/Fire          Ice/Dark/Poison           ---
Magical        Unlife                   Magic/Energy              ---
Mythical       ---                      Fire/Ice/Unlife/Earth/Air ---
Orc            Fire/Light/Pure          Ice/Poison/Dark           ---
Reptile        Ice/Fire                 Water                     ---
Rodent         Gas/Poison               Dark                      ---
Skeleton       ---                      Pierce/Slash              ---
Snake          ---                      ---                       Poison
Spider         Fire                     ---                       Poison
Troll          Fire/Acid/Mental         Earth/Poison/Crush        ---
Undead         Pure/Light/Silver/Heal   Earth/Water/Air/Mental    Unlife/Dark
Vampire        Pure/Light/Silver/Wood   Crush                     Unlife/Dark
* A number of creature types have no matching slay-weapon. Or none suitable
  for testing. These are:
    Amphibian, Astral, Beholder, Bird, Canine, Dinosaur, Elemental, Entity,
    Fairie, Feline, Fish, Half-Orc, Hobbit, Insect, Insubstantial, Jelly,
    Ktv, Lizardman, Reptile, Rodent, Skeleton, Spider
  For these, mobs have been pinned with those types anyway, if their irv:s
  match and their descriptions point towards it.
* Entity has same irv:s as mythical. Any mob marked "[entity]" has the irv:s
  matching, and is not mythical.


Useful to know when checking:
=============================
fire breath   => can VAPE eq!
Immune dark   => immune blindness  ("Your victim is immune to your spell.")
Immune unlife => immune wither     ("Your victim is immune to your spell.")
"somewhat resilient" to blindness => resist dark
Resistance to unlife will NOT give a warning when using wither on the mob.
It is possible to poison a mob that is immune to poison: No damage is taken
per tick and no "looks really sick" messages will show, but it's seen with
the "detect poison" spell and regen rate is slowed.
Wither on Resist unlife: 80% of old maxhp
Wither on Normal:        2/3 of old maxhp
Wither on Vuln unlife:   50% of old maxhp
no-charm & NOT thief     => immune blind
NOTE: Immune blind does not _HAVE_ to implicate immunity to dark
Agg-sleeper means the mob is agg-all and has a wimpy-flag (flees)
mountable => leadable
water-living => Can't enter non-water rooms even with fly
Lvl X cloudkill     works on mobs of lvl (X-2) / 2, rounded down
Lvl 88 cloudkill    works on mobs of lvl 1-43
Lvl 100 cloudkill   works on mobs of lvl 1-49
At lvl 66-100, charm works on lvl 53 mobs but NOT on lvl 54 mobs
A successful energy drain gives you <target's level> * 3.75 mana, rounded
down (minus the casting cost of 20). So to get level: (/ managain+20 3.75), rounded up.
# The kingdom of Inglestone (266): 30-100, Smack  (Ofcol: 2w7s2w3s11wnw5nwn)
* FIND OUT: The Chaos Rogue                xp,                  agg-N, hp, hp, money, [human?], irvs
* FIND OUT: The Dark Priest of Chaos       xp,                         hp, hp, money, [human?], irvs
* FIND OUT: The Warlock of Chaos           xp,                  agg-N, hp, hp, money, [human?], irvs
* FIND OUT: Korr, the Overlord of Chaos    xp, walk, see invis, agg-N, hp, hp, money
#
#     Priest                        o
#        |                          |
# Rogue-Korr-Warlock            o - o - o
#        |                         /|
#        o   Blood                / o
#        |   worm                /  |
#     o--o   Queen              /   o
#     |        |             o /    |
#    s10       o             |/     o               King+ o
#     |        |           o-o-o    |                 |
#    s10       o            /|      o             o - o - o
#     |        |           / o      |                 |
#    s10       o-o        /         o   o - o         o
#     |        ^ |     o /          |   |             |
#    s10       | |     |/           o - o         o - o - o
#     |        o-o-o-o-o-o          |                 |
#    s03              /|            o                 o
#     |            o / o            |                /
#     o + b        |/               o + a - o - o - o
#     |          o-o-o-o-o-o                |
#     |           /|            o - o - o - o - o - o
#     |/---------/ o            |   |       |
#     o                         o - o       o
#                               |   |       |
#                               o - o       o
#                               |   |       |
#                               o - o   o - o - o
#                               |   |       |
#                               o - o   o - o - o
#                               +           |
#                             safe          X
#                             room          +
#
* a: break bar    (need strength sum 45)
* b: push boulder (need strength sum 75 or 76). Boulder can't kill you.
* s: spider rooms (3 spiders in the first room, 10 spiders in the other ones)
* Whole area is very bright
* Dwarves are vuln water/magic/superlarge

# FIXME: AN OWN MAP!
*
 X = First room / obelisk
* QM = QuestMaster
* S = Shop
* Sm = Shop (maps)
* auc = Auction House
* bt = Blossom Temple
* cwp = Clearwater Pool
* d = Donation Antechamber
* fls = Flower Shrine
* FG = Flower Garden
* gm = Guildmaster (practice spells/skills)
* GH = Greenhouse
* i = item store
* ma = Magnolia Altar
* mc = Meeting Circle (No-Mag, board)
* mt = Magnolia Temple
* nG = North Gate of Kultheas
* p = Post Office
* pfg = Picturesque Flower Garden
* r = The Rosebud Inn (rent/togg play)
* rt = Rose Temple
* RoR = Ring of Roses (enter field for a temeport, seems to be a random teleport on NC)
* sa = Sunflower Altar
* seG = South-East Gate of Kultheas
* swG = South-West Gate of Kultheas
* t = Tumulus
* (Al|Iv|Ds) = Azure Lake|Icewood Vale|Desolate Steppes
* Area is...?
* Other useful info...?

* advisable against Loreshi, and tortured souls only has resists.

#       +   +   +   +   +   +     |*    +   +   +   +   +   +
# Ice<+ w - o - w - o - w - o --- P --- o - w - o - w - o - o +>Air
#       +   +   +   +   +   +    x|     +   +   +   +   +   +
#       v   v   v   v   v   v   o |     v   v   v   v   v   v

#                         o       |
#                        x    c<+ w +>c
#                       o         |
#                      x      s<+ o +>c
#                     o           |
#                    /        c<+ w +>c
#                   o             |
#                  /          s<+ o +>c
#                 o               |
#                /            c<+ w +>c
#             Lord                +
#                                 v
#                               Earth
#
* c: Crypt. Door is locked on both sides, and going back out always leads to P.
* s: As above, but with spirit.
* C: As above, but with A demon of old.
* w: Watchman of the Dark
* The small Guardians can be a pain, but easily avoided with darkness.
* The entrance key pops pretty often and doors don't close/lock at reset.
* Down from the centre is not allowed for good-align.
* All up-exits from the centre-down lead back to entrance.

#     o - o       o - o - o - o - R - R - R - R   Rhalarji
#     |           |   |           |   |       |      |
#     o           o   |           R - R       R ---- R
#     |           |   |
# X - o           o - o
# |
#
* R = Raider rooms
* M = Marsh: Sleep there and you will die.
*            Sit and you will die in a few seconds unless you stand up.
* Careful in Raider rooms - many! Firebeasts can be avoided using darkness.

#    DiS                 |                |       |        |   +
#     | *            o   o                o - o - o   QM + o + o

#     +          +                            |            |

# FIXME! Fix an own map
* 
* X = First room
* S = shop (Alain's Blades)
* ANR = A Nightmarish Reality. Enter portal in sbf room to get here. recall, summon and dd works
* aws = armless white statue
* BHS = The Base of the Hollow Spire
* CotS = Cottage of the Seer
* DiS =  Diabolic Sanctum, altar covered in blood (enter altar to get to area below)
* FoS = Flesh of Sin. Need to kill wall of flesh to open passage north
* G'qor = G'qor the witch's lieutenant is not aggro, has key to trapdoor down, easy with exp group
*         this room also has a pentagram on the floor (enter pentagram is a DT)
* HiC = Hillside Cemetary (key to gate is on ground here or in the corpse on the ground)
* HofB = Home of the Burgomeister
* mp = 2x mad priests (not aggro)
* p = pentagram on floor, enter pentagram is a DT
* RPLT = Resting Place of Lord Tarrant (Not aggro, has tattered cape), blessed orb of light in coffin
* Sep = Sepulchure, Tus'schepteba's little lair. Tus'schepteba disappears upon entering the room.
* SubC = Subterranean Catacombs (enter altar in DiS to enter, open trapdoor up to get back to DiS)
* sbf = shimmering black field (enter portal to get to Necromancer area). Only appears after Tus'schepteba is killed?
* skg = Aggro skeleton guard (has key to the gate east of here), and Dengraz'ch (a dragon) is here but NOT aggro
        east of here there might be damned souls (aggro, easy with group)
*
* crazed Nek'rabeast - delayed aggro, easy with group, found in the kitchen of the Manor
* A wall of flesh - [INFO] Not aggro, easy with big group (opens passage to the north upon death)
* Tus'schepteba - [INFO] Not aggro, easy with big group (opens the portal to Nightmarish Reality upon death?)
* Lord Tarrant - [INFO] Not aggro, easy with big group, found in Resting Place of Lord Tarrant
* Xanclaw - [INFO] aggro, hits HARD and might murder someone. Quite easy with big group though
* The Necromancer - [INFO] Not aggro, hits hard, quest mob for A Rotten Heart quest, no problem with big group
* Whole area is ...?
* More info...?

#
#          ^     ^                 ^         ^    ^
#          |     \_____            |         |    |
#  <---\   |           \           \-------- j ---|->
#      |   |           |                     |    |
#  <---|-- o --------- o ------- sign ----poster--|->
#      |   |           |                     ^    |
#      |   |  |        |                     |    |
#      |   |  b  /---- o<--\                 |    |
#      |   |  |  |     |   |                 |    |
#      |   |  \-+o--poster |                 |    |
#      |   |     |     |   |                 |    |
#      |   |     |     v   |            b <- o ---/
#      \-- o ----|-----poster                |
#          |     |        |                  |
#          |     |        \____________      |
#          |     |                     \     |
#  <------ o --- X --------------------|---- o ----->
#          |    /|   \              /  |     |                             o <-\
#          | OUT |    \            |   |     |                            /|   |
#          |     |     |/          g - o --- o ----->                   |/ o   |
#  <------ d --- o --- a           |   |     |                d       - a  |   |
#         /|     |    /|           o -/   /- o ----\         /         /|  \-> o
#          |     |     |           |     /  /      |        o - o o <-/        +
#      /-- o --- o --- o <--\      |    |  v       |        |   |/|            |
#      |   |     |  \  |    |      |    |  o       |        o - o f      /---> b
#      |   |     |   \-|--- o -- o-o -- o  |       |              |     /      |
#      |   |     |     |    |   /  |    |  |       |              o    /       \-+-
#  <---/   |     |     v    |  |   |    \--|-o-----o --->         |   /

# The desert city of Milo'rai (295): 50-100, Stryder  (Speedie information below the map)
#
#                     o-o X   Well (ask spirit bless)
#                       |/     |   (enter oasis)
#                  ATM--o------o
#      As _____________/|
#       +/              |
#   o---o-o    o        |
#   |   | |    |        |
# Item  o o  o+o--o-----o
# Store        |     o  |
#              |    /   |
#              o   Gs-+-o  o
#               \          |
#              o-\+o----Fountain--Fs
#                 \|\
#                  o \  Ms+o
#                     \___ |
#                         \|
#                          o
#                          |
#                          o
#
#
* Whole area is nosum/norecall. Only way out is through the well or using the
* obelisk at X. Obelisk navigator can take you NC obelisks as well.
* Entrance from Navigator in Desert. Ask him "home" (you must be Ktv)
* Path to find navigator, starting and ending at Thalos obelisk:
*    eenne(w)wswswenwnnwsnnnseswwwe(nw)wew(s)s(ew)ne(w)ne(w)ne(wswss)sss(sw)
* Directions within parentheses lead to rooms that have been passed before.
* Entering the oasis (the Well) only works if someone has entered the well
* through the real entrance at its current position. It will bring you to a
* random room on level 1 to <maxExploredLevel>
* You can enter the oasis only once every 360-383 seconds.

# Mirror Beyond (197):  (Speedie information below the map)
#
# X     Detrom
# |       |
# o - o - o
#     |   |
#    RIP- o - o
#
* Part of The forgotten citadel of Taon
* All directions are reversed (type "west" to go east etc)
*
* 10 mirrors are spread out in the world. Only one is possible to enter.
* Which one, changes from time to time. Probably when zone resets.
* Don't know if there is any specific order in which they change.
* Mirror locations:
*    1: Karandras:    10wn3wswswn3w
*    2: Karandras:    5s3w2s7e
*    3: Karandras:    10e10n2e2ne
*    4: Kings Castle: 3wnwne2nw2nwne2s
*    5: Ofcol:        2n
*    6: Olympus:      e5s3dsd
*    7: Sundhaven:    2e4n2w2ndne2sesese3neses
*    8: Karandras:    3s2en3e2se3suw3n
*    9: Ultima:       top floor
*   10: Inside Taon
*
* Just after boot mirror 5 (ofcol-2n) was open.

Mirror Beyond:           Lvl    Xp ASWIDMX # agg     Hp        Gold    Special
Detrom                    97       N--x    1 GN     ?           0      INFO, [human], Only appears when someone enters his room. NOT vuln heal but starts at awful and gains hp when you hurt him. Dies when on full hp. Does not seem to be vuln light, but maybe vuln pure? Murder messes up so he dies "badly" without dogtags. Room is noflee, but recall and summon out works. If nobody is in the room he returns to corpse-state (item) and when reappearing he has lost any bad spells cast on him, and health is probably reset too.

#  |/ o o  |    o---o---o---o   o   +       |   ^ |   |    o
# Bar------o-Ms |   |   |   |  x    X       |    \|   |
#          |    o---o---o---o o     |       o---o-o---o
#          o        |   |   |/      o       |   | |   |
#                   o---o---o       |     o o---o-o---o
#                  x    +      -o-o-o      \|   | |
#                ame   eme                  o---o-o
#
* North part and the towers are very bright
* Very nice area. Lots of different mobs and items. Most mobs are humans.
* Getting to top of the towers gives seals that can be given to the king for
*  a reward. Right tower is just fighting, but left can be climbed peacefully.
* Vell, hi!: Room is norecall/nosum/nosumout with no exits. Has a lvl 60
*  Bear-de-bear without worn eq. Caerlin and the masters in west tower used to
*  go there when dying.

* Whole area (except sw dump) is very bright
* Shops open at 5 am and close at 9 pm.
* Glimmering rift, teleporting around in Myrridon: 1 room with Thorn demon.
* Nasty aggies in dump (sw), shards (ne), shaman (s), and some aggressive
* thugs in the centre. Plus the tower elite guards are agg-evil.
* Normal guards are protectors.
* Most mobs are human - vuln slay human. Children steal money!

* S: Small-sized demon,    M: Medium-sized demon
* L: Large-sized demon,    G: Giant-sized demon
* House and castles are very bright.
* Demon king's room is norecall, but has a pile of BONES you can enter if not
*   fighting, to recall to OC. So kill him or die! (or use sneak/rescue/...)
* Queen's room is noflee but recallable
* Many npc:s here have insane amounts of hp!

A swan            A swan gracefully drifts past you.

A salmon          A salmon leaps out of the water infront of you.

# Nefertum's Ocean Floor (468): 40-90, Nefertum  (Elemental Canyon: us4dese2se2nwnw3nwne)

#              Oceanos
#              (altar)
#
* The whole underwater area is norecall, but you can summon people in.
* Some rooms are very bright
* bush: To get past it, have a friend open it while you keep trying to go west.
*       Once it's been opened from the inside, it will stay open.
* a: Aggressive mob in this room
* Fishes are immune to water
* God rooms have min level 0/47-0/48

Ocean Floor:                           Lvl    Xp ASWIDMX # agg     Hp        Gold      Special
A cannibal                               1       N-x--     -      1-1         1-1      +1 starthp
Oceanos' High Priestess                 37       N-        ---                1-1      summons Oceanos on death

# The City of Palanthas (389): 50-100, Rafo/Vortex  (Palanthas: -)
#
#        Raistlin*-> Takhisis
#           |
#           o
#          /
#      Dalamar
#        /
#       o                                            o - Tacheron
#      /|                                            |
#     o o ---------------- B                    Abomination
#     |                    |                    Necromancer
#     |   o   o   o - B - Lord                       |
#     |   |   |       |   Soth                       o
# o - o - o - o       o                              +
#     |       |       |                              o
# o   o       o       o                             /
# |   |               |       o - o                o
# o-o-o-o         o - o - o   |   |                |
#     |               |       o - f - o -> g - o - o
#     o           o - o - o       ^
#                     |           |
#                 o - o - o       /    Astinus        o           o
#                     |          /        +           |           |
#                     o         /     o - o - o   o - o - o   o - o - o
#                     |        /          |           |           |
#               Bak - o - Ms  /       o - o - o   o - o - o   o - o - o
#                     |      /            |           |           |
#             o - o - f - o-/-o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o
#             |       |    /  |       +
#         o   As  Au  X*--/   Ws      o
#         |   |   |   |       |
#         o - o - o - o - o - o
#         |       |   |
#     o - o       Q   o
#                 |   |
#                 o   o
#                     |
#                     X - Q - o
#                     |
#
* Some rooms are very bright.
* g: Second time you go here, you can only go back.
* B: Only mages can move here. Others take damage when trying,
*    losing 45-90% maxhp (summoning shadow dragons).
*    You don't need to be pure mage.
* To get to Takhisis: Good Pr/Pr or Pr: open portal
*                     Evil Ma/Ma or Ma: open portal

Folk vet inte att #Taiji skickar fngade delfiner och valar till delfinarier. Vi MSTE utbilda dem

@SeaWorld ni r skyldiga till mord
Vi Frlter Inte

I r kommer #Taiji fnga levande delfiner till delfinarier, Vi kommer inte att lta det ske utan att gra ngot.

#Taji r snart igng igen. Vi mste f #Japan att skmmas fr att de tillter slakten p delfiner.

Leendet sedan lnge borta. Hon dog i plgor s att @SeaWorld kunde f de sta sm.

nnu en fngad medan hennes familj ropar nedifrn. Hur kan mnniskopr gra detta? Vi ska stoppa dem #Taiji

Om vrlden fr veta kommer de stnga ned oss. #Taiji

Hon dog i #Taiji s att du kunde se en delfinshow.
Stoppa detta NU

Folk vet inte att #Taiji skickar fngade delfiner och valar till delfinarier. Vi MSTE utbilda dem

I r kommer #Taiji fnga levande delfiner till @SeaWorld China, Vi kommer inte att lta det ske utan att gra ngot. Hjlp oss

nnu en fngad medan hennes familj ropar nedifrn. Hur kan mnniskopr gra detta? Vi ska stoppa dem #Taiji

lskar du #delfiner? Vill du hjlpa oss stoppa slakten i #Taiji? Hjlp oss #Spanien

106 vattenparker runt om i vrlden har just nu delfiner som fngats i Taiji. Stoppa Detta Nu

Delfiner hr hemma i havet, inte i ett akvarium eller p en tallrik - snlla hjlp dem

Denna albinobbis stals frn sin mor. medan resten av hennes familj slaktades! i #Taiji

Bortrvad frn havet. Nu trnad att slava fr ditt nje. Stoppa slakten

Delfiner hr hemma i havet, inte i ett akvarium eller p en tallrik #OpKillingBay

Frn havet i #Taiji till slakthuset. Detta r realitet fr delfiner i #Japan #OpKillingBay

# FIXME: Fix an own map
* msl = 3x medium-sized lizard (aggro, vuln fire?)
* bg = bodyguards, aggro info mobs, hits HARD
*
* Note: lizards/lizardmen are vuln fire?
* Note: Down from (R)owland and beyond there might be several aggro lizard/lizardman
*       medium-sized and hungry lizardmen are soloable. Continue from here with caution.
* Note: furious, armored and gold-armored lizardman are info mobs and hits HARD
* Note: King's bodyguards are info mobs and hits HARD
*
* Note: say komodo (to open door to Chamber of Keys)
*
* X = First room
* E = Entrance to the village
* QM = QuestMaster
* b = The brewery
* ch = A Commander's Home / Leah, the wife of Alkariz
* CoK = Chamber of Keys / cabinet (room is NO-MAG)
* csq = Centersquare
* dc = The dog cages
* mos = Mortarstreet
* ps = Public square
* R = Rowland, the grumpy explorer (lvl 70, NOT aggro)
* S = Shop
* sm = Smithy
* st = The stables
* tpt = A tight passage in the tunnel. Max 1 in this room
* vh = Villager's house / Villager's home
* vs = Village shrine
* wt = The Watchtower
* Whole area is ...?
* More info...?

# Nefertum's Ragnarok (452): 50-100, Nefertum  (Karandras: 10wn3wswswn12ws2w2sws3wnwn5u10nd)
* FIND OUT: Try slay human                   on Viking
*               magic/energyonly             on giant warrior,
*               crush/pierce                 on fire/frost giant,
*               crush/slay giant             on Berserker
*               unlife/iron/slay human       on Valkyrie

* b: Back to the same room
* A: Angerboda
* O: Odin's Vikings Rooms. Contains 16 vikings for Odin to summon.
* NOTE: Contingency doesn't work (never even tries to kick in) when fighting
* Frost/fire giant, Berserker, Heimdall or Angerboda. Works for Giant Warrior,
* Odin and Thor.
* Wolves are vuln mental, but resist dark (so not Nemesis)

# FIXME: AN OWN MAP!
*
* Watch out for the DT in Aramut's Workroom
*
* X = First room (no-magic)
* Ob = obelisk
* QM = QuestMaster
* MP = Manor Porch
* S = Shop
* Sm = Shop (maps)
* ES = Elgin Square (open chair down, to open secret passage into the Manor)
* a = Altar
* as = Amid Ships
* auc = Auction Hall
* b = bulletin board
* Bnk = Milos' Office, the tax collector with banking hobby (deposit, withdraw, move cash)
* c = chest (Aramut's chest)
* CFM = Crowded Fish Market
* gm = Guildmaster (practice spells/skills)
* h = Harem Room
* i = item store
* p = Post Office
* PC = Degruziel's Private Chamber (Degruziel has key to harem, wu from PC)
* r = The Falcon Inn (rent/togg play)
* rsg = Room Full of Stolen Goods
* TC = the Manor Torture Chamber
* thc = Trianne's Hidden Cache
* Area is...?
* Other useful info...?

* Min level >20
* Whole area is very bright
* Many low-level aggies sitting down, so turning off agg-mode can help if going here alone.
* Tav = Tavern, Sh = Shimryl's, Gs = Gear shop, As = Armor shop, Ws = Weapon shop
* Fs = Food shop, Ms = Magic shop, Ps = Potion shop
* DBG = Darkmoon Brigands Guild: Lock - 3 x A darkmoon rogue 3, Vargel, Vincent Darkedge
* NHD = Noble House Deviir:      5x A drow guard, A drow militia veteran -> Lock ->
*                                noble high priestess (agg), militia veteran, 6x drow guard, all assisting
*                                drow patrol and mounted lizard-rider patrol moving around inside
* ArT = Arach Tinilith:          A talon of the dark mother (casts mira) has entry key
* SoA = Sorcere Academy:         Unpickable door. No key?
* MeM = Melee Magthere:          Chained wyvern (agg), 2x militia veteran (assisting, one has key)

* Part of Fishing Village/Sea Routes
* 2 ships. Both built the same. One run by Nardogan and one by Nagodran.
* Nagodran:s ship has no crew except the captain himself.
* From OC: King's Castle: 3wnwne2nw2nwne2nwn3en2es2enen5e, enter portal,
*          4e4s5e, board ship
* From NC: Myrridon: 2w4sw2s2w2s, board ship
* Each ship takes a little more than 3 hours to complete a round.

#
* Min level 0/40 (Valley of Kings)
* Nice & safe lowbie-exp area. Just watch the DT:s
* Zombies & Spectre are vuln heal/pure/light/silver

# Quest Zone, Sin: ?-?, ?  (New Thalos: 2en2e2n2wn2wn2wn8d4ne)

#                      |   |
#             /------> X   o  Palladrus

#             \        +     |  t
#              \-----> X     + /

* Entrance from Kerjim, which has min level 0/35
* t: tunnel (max 2(?) pers)
* Fallen Angels, Azrael, Crowley, Feast & Palladrus are vuln pure/light/iron
* Book & Gargoyle is vuln unlife
* Palladrus (northern) part is norecall

Mob descriptions (for mobsubs.tf):
Gargoyle:     A Demonic Statue stands here. (Red Aura)
Fallen Angel: An angel stands here, its once angelic appearence replaced with a demonic.
Book:         A book flutters about the room.
?:            A snake is here, reading a book.

# Nefertum's White Snake Lair (348): 50-100, Nefertum  (Slithering: e)
* FIND OUT: Need a special weapon to get the snakeskins?
*           Can give snakeskin: Chakara, Snake shaped hammer, parang, ...?
#
#                                    o----o-----o
#                                    |          |
#                                  o-o-o        o   o-o
#                                  |   |       /      |
#                                o-o o-o      o-o-o o-o
#                                    |        |   | |
#                                    o-o-o-o  o-b o-i-o  o-------------o
#               9         1              |           /   |            /
#               ^         ^              o          o----o RIP       o
#               |         |              |               |  |        |
#           11<-6---------5->7           o               o--o o-o  o-o-o
#               |         |              +                  | |    | + |
#    -X---o  1<-3---------|-----------\  o                  o-o  o-o+A+o-o
#        /      |         |            \ |                       |   +   |
#       o   10<-2->5    /-9-\  8   8  /--4--\                    |   o o-o
#      /        |       \_|_/  ^   ^  \__|__/                    |   | |
#     o      7<-1->5      |    |   |     |                       o---o-o
#    /          |     7<-10----7--11-----8-> 4
#   o           o         |    |   |     |
#  /            |         v    v   v     v
# o-------------o        11    6   6     9
#
* Min level 0/50 (by cave entrance)
* b = Bowl of blood. Max 2 in this room
* i = Inscription
* A = Altar
* Snakes are immune poison

# RIP-o----o---o----o-RIP          |   3<- 3 ------------------ 4 ->4
#     |    |   |   /|              |       |                    |

#                                                   |  10   ^   9

#
* Min level 0/32
* Toll-Gate room is very bright. Beware Zarak - nasty backstabber.
* Ancient ghosts are vuln energy but immune to pierce. All 3 in the same room,
*  but once they've been in fight, they will start moving around.
*  Once killed, the wand bearer spawns on the "f"?

# The city of Stonewell (?): 1-100, Stryder (?/?-?min)  (Myrridon: 24ws2ws2ws2ws3ws3ws2w2nw10nen3ene2nw5n)
#
#                            |       (Ashinara rivers)
#                            o - o - o -
#                                |   |
#          (Ashinara - Roads 2)  o
#                                |
# o ------------- o ------------ ng ----------- o ----------- o
# |                              |                            |
# |                 o            o                            |
# |                /             |                            |
# |               o              |                 o          |
# |              /               o                /           |
# |             s4    Boss  S    |   sr          o            |
# o             |      +    |    |   |          /             o
# |             o ---- o ---o--- o - o - o - o - o    o       |
# |                    |                 |    /  |   /        |
# |               co - o     gm          |  s1 - o  o         |
# |                    |    /            |         /          |
# |                S   |   b     int a   o - ar   s3          |
# |                |   |   |     |   |   |        |           |
# wg - o - o - f - o - o - o --- t - o - o - o -- X - o - o - eg
# |                    |   |    /|   |   |                    |
# |                    |   |   d o   p   |                    |
# |        o           |   |     |       |                    |
# |       /            |   I - i |       |                    |
# |      o        Sq - o   |     |       o - S          o     |
# |     /              |   r     |       |             /      |
# |    s2              |         |       |            o       |
# |    |               |         |       |           /        |
# |    o --- o -- o -- o -- o -- o - o - o - o - o ----- o    |
# |    |               |    |    |   |   +       | /     |    |
# o    o - dun        Bnk   S    o   S   ba      s5      cd   o
# |    |                         |       |                    |
# |   fort                       o       o                    |
# |                              |                            |
# |                              o                            |
# |                              |                            |
# o ------------- o ------------ sg ----------- o ----------- o
#                                |
#                                o (Ashinara - Roads 2)
#                                |
# FIXME: Own map!
* X = First room
* S = Shop
* Sq = Shop with quest item (haggis, for A taste of home)
* Boss = Mob Boss (lvl 116-120, kill for quest, not aggro)
* a = Auction Hall
* ar = Armory
* b = bulletin board
* ba = The Brewers Arms (Shop)
* Bnk = The Bank (deposit, withdraw, move cash)
* cd = The city dump
* co = Castellan's Office
* d = Donation Chamber
* dun = Stonewell Dungeons
* f = fountain
* fort = Stonewell Fortress
* gm = Guildmaster (practice spells/skills)
* i = item store
* I = The Rising Sun Inn
* int = The Interior of the Temple (No Magic)
* p = Post Office
* r = The Reception (rent/togg play)

# FIXME: AN OWN MAP!
* X = First room
* QM = QuestMaster
* S = Shop
* SS = Stormhaven Square (No-Magic)
* CLord = The Crimelord (HIGH level, kill for quest, not aggro, room is No recall)
* a = Auction Hall
* b = bulletin board
* Bnk = The Bank (deposit, withdraw, move cash)
* boS = burnt-out shop
* bs = Stormhaven Bookshop
* d = Donation Chamber
* dl = Foyer in the Dragon Lair
* dp = Dragon Priest
* eg = Stormhaven Engraver
* ft = Ferry Terminal
* hd = Hom eof the Head Dragon
* i = item store
* p = Post Office
* r = Front Desk (rent/togg play)
* sLo = South wall look-out
* swLo = South-west look-out
* tr = Training room (practice spells/skills)
* vg = The Vale Gatehouse
* vc = A vacant shop
* (Al|Iv|Ds) = Azure Lake|Icewood Vale|Desolate Steppes
* Area is...?
* Other useful info...?

# The Tournament (153): 40-100, Sanders (?/50-73min)  (Myrridon: 24ws2ws2w2ses2e3n2e)
#
#        Torturer
#           |
#         o+o+o
#           |    o--o--o
#         o+o+o  |     |
#           |    | G-o |
#         o+o+o  o | | o
#           |    | o-G |
#         o+o+o  | |   |
#           |    o-o---o
#           o ____/|
#           |/     |
#           o      |           o - o - o - o - o
#                  |           |               |
# Bookie - o - o - Q - o - o - o - o          RIP
#                  |
#             Cs - o - Ss
#                  |
#             As - o - Gs          o
#                  |               |
#             Ws - o - Fs      o - o - o
#                  |           |       |

#                                  o

* Whole area is very bright (except near the Bookie)
* Most are vuln to slay human. Careful with the agg Gladiators ("G")
* Kill Silver Paladin before Black Knight, since you need damage-mana for
* paladin while the knight is a shrugger.

* 5: going north takes you east
* 9: going south takes you southwest
* #: 4 nasty mobs
* <f>: The left one is a normal room if you come from the south. If you go
* from the north, it is instead the <f> room in the southeast you will get to.
* WORMS: Standing here will summon worms to hunt you (they walk n-u, and if
*        nobody there, they return back to their hideout again)
* 2: Standing here did summon worms to hunt you (once here they'll just stay
*    here and wait). That special seems to have been removed.
* Many aggressive, unavoidable, walking eyes. Vuln unlife.

# The Underground (516): 50-100, Barre  (Myrridon: 2w2nwnd)
#
#       o - o + o Murderer  Hide   Bob
#       |   |   |    |       |      |
# - o - o -Bar  o    o       o      o       o - o   o - D1
#       |   |   |    |       |      |       |       |
#       o - o   o    o       o      o       o   o - o   o
#              x|    |       |      |       |   |   |   |
#             X-|-+--o ----- o ---- o - o + o - o   o - o
#               |    |       |      |       |       |
#               +    o       o      o       o   o   o - o
#               o -  |       |      |       |   |       |
#                    o       o      o       o - o  D2<+ o
#                    |       |      |
#                 Spell-  Fighter  Bar
#                 weaver
#
* To get down: pull crate
* Whole area is very bright. Bar opens at 1 am and closes at ? ?m.
* Bob is aggressive & dangerous.
* Carrion Crawlers (vul gas) in east part has nasty stun.

* "ask Hermes death" to enter
* From barge to kings: 10n5e2ne3nw3n
* "enter stone" to leave, bringing followers, "touch stone" to leave alone
* Whole area is nosum/norecall
* All parts except Asphodel Fields, Vale of Mourning, Towers of Paradise,
*   outer ring of Elysium Fields, Tartarus and Mountain are very bright
* Passing to/from bridge before Nyx may make you fall down to the area below
* To get past door to Hades: evil    lvl 55+ nb/nb:  touch door
*                            good    lvl 55+ te/te:  touch door
*                            neutral lvl 55+ leader: touch door
*                            Left Hades: vuln fire. Right Hades: vuln ice.
* Robe of blood: First kill Tisiphone, then Hades. Then the robe is in either
* evil(E) or good(G) room. The key to these rooms dissolves on use, and robe
* is no-locate, so it's 50% chance to get it.
* Soldiers & most other xp-mobs are vuln pure/dark
