# Unholy Darkness (176): 25-100, Stile/Acheron  (King's Castle: 6wn3wswnd)
* FIND OUT: Level on A shadow mage/thief/... for different levels
#
#                            o - o - o - o
#                                |       +
#  o   o ---------- o ---------- o - o - o
#  |   |                         +
#  o - o   o                     o - o --- o - o
#  |   |   |                     |   |     |   |
#  o   o - o  Damien-o           o-Drakith-o - o
#          +    x|               |  x|     |   |
# o-o ---- X <-/ |               o-/-o --- o - o
# | |            |                 |
# o o-o-o Shop+o-o-o               v
#   |   |        |                 o
#   o   o+Shop o-o-o               |
#                |       Shop  o-o+o-RIP
#                o o       +   |
#                |/|     o-o---o-o   o---o
#                X |       |   |     |   +
#                  |       o Cain--o-o   v
#                - o -             |     o - o - o -- o
#                                  o-o   |   |   |    |
#                                  |     o - o - o -- o
#                                  o     |   |   |    |
#                                        o - o-Beldar-o
#                                               x
#                            o - o    o - o <--/
#                                |    |
#                        o - o - o-Tarbor+o - o
#                        +                |
#                        v        o - o - o - o
#                   /-<- o ->-\           +   |
#          RIP  RIP/           \RIP     Shop  o - o
#           |    |/             \|
#     RIP - o -- o ------------- o - RIP
#           |                    |          Home
#     RIP - o -- o      Infernos-o - RIP    /           (nomag)
#           |    |         x|    |         o <+ o -> o +> o
#     RIP - o    o        o o -- o - RIP        ^         |
#           |    |       /  |    |              |         v
#          RIP  RIP     o  RIP  RIP             o   RIP + o + RIP
#                      /                        ^         +
#                     o                         |         | /->Home
#                    /                          |         v/
#                    \------> o -----> o +----> o   o + GHANZ
#
* Min level 0/20
* Whole area, except level 2, is very bright
* Only evil aligned can go west from Ghanz.
* Shop: All four shops are the same. Entrance locked and no-pick. No key.
*       One-player-only, noexit/nomag. Exa mirror = recall.
*       Every zone reset, there's a chance one of the doors will be unlocked.
*       Shop on lvl 4 is sometimes open just after or just before reboot.
*       If before, it opens when you see "[NOTICE] Rebooting in 3 minutes..."

* FIND OUT: Does the area ever respawn?
* FIND OUT: Level on a Myconid Soldier (1-67)
* FIND OUT: Level on The red worm (1-67)
* FIND OUT: Level on A Behir (1-67)
#
#                Example 1                                 Example 2
#  o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o-o     o- o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o
#  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   | |     |  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |
#  o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o-o     o- o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o -WM
#  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   | |     |  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |
# WM - o - o -WM - o - o -NM - o - o-o     o-GRE- o - F - o - o - o - o -WM - o
#  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   | |     |  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |
#  o - o - o - o - o - o - o -WM - o-o     o- o - o - o -WM - o - o -WM - o - o
#  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   | |     |  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |
#  o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o-o     o- o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o -NM
#  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   | |     |  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |
#  o - o - o - o -XXX- o - o - o - o-o     o- o - o - o -XXX- o - o - o - o - o
#  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   | |     |  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |
#  o -GRE- o - o - o - o - o - o -WM-o     o-NM - o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o
#  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   | |     |  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |
#  o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o-o     o- o - o - o - o - o - o -WM -NM - o
#  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   | |     |  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |
#  o - o - o - o - o - F - o -NM - o-o     o- o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o
#  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   | |     |  |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |
#  o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o -NM-o     o- o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o
#
* The area is created each time you enter, with random placement of Grell,
* fountain and nomag/wildmag rooms. 3 mob types are randomly chosen and
* distributed in the area. If you die or Burning reboots, you have to leave
* the quest and rejoin it to be able to enter it again.
* Mobs first time: 12 mages,  10 eaters,    8 grimlocks, 1 grell
* Second time:     12 eaters, 10 grimlocks, 6 behirs,    1 grell
* Whole area is nosum/norecall
* Nomag rooms are always no-fight
* F: The Fountain of the Gods: Gives full hp/mana/move. One time only.

# FIXME: AN OWN MAP!
*
* X = First room
* QM = QuestMaster
* S = Shop
* Sm = Shop (maps)
* a = Altar
* jbc = Jarl's Bedchamber
* r = The Falcon Inn (rent/togg play)
* gran = The Granary
* auc = Auction Hall
* emp = Entrance to Valheim Marketplace
* GS = Gefjun square
* ab = Administration Building
* d = Donation room (Alms Shanty)
* fp = Fire Pit
* va = Valheim Aviary
* p = Post Depot
* i = item store
* b = bulletin board
* gm = Guildmaster (practice spells/skills)
* ff = Fountain of Freyja
* fs = Furnace square
* gt = guard tower
* gs = Guard Station
* mg = mmain gates of Valheim
* egt = Gatehouse - East Guard tower
* wgt = Gatehouse - West Guard tower
* Lm = Lumber mill
* SoA = source of the Aulden
* Area is...?
* Other useful info...?

# The Well (551-552):
* FIND OUT: LOTS!
* FIND OUT: What is the chance of getting frags from a mob?
* FIND OUT: What is the chance of the frags being type X (depending on level)
* FIND OUT: Levels on: A boulder           (44-46)
*                      The Dao Khan        (98-99)

*           Greater medusa    vuln to magic?
*           Ice elemental     resists ice?
*           Water elem (easy) resists crush?
*           Water elem (hard) resists crush?
*           Otyugh            vuln to magic?
*           Otyugh            resists energy?
*           Elementals        vuln to unlife?
#
* Moves every 6 hour. Can be tracked with a 'compass' (item found in well).
* Being the first to enter the Well in a new location gives +1 rep and +1 qp,
* and allows people to enter the well through Milo'rai.
*
* Compass: Points toward the well. Direction is shown by a number (0-359).
*   0: Straight north
*  90: Straight east (or not possible to walk to without portal/ship/dragon)
* 180: Straight south
* 270: Straight west
* Compass looks for the closest route and then calculates the direction,
* counting each step to be of equal length. Note that many areas overlap, so
* even if you find the exact spot, you might not find it (then it's in another
* area of the same longitude & latitude)
*
* Room names:
* A Small Passage             : -
* A Small Cavern              : -
* A Glittering Passage        : Can't trapdoor!
* A Shimmering Room           : Can't trapdoor!
* A Magical Waterfall         : Wild Magic. Can't trapdoor!
* In the Essence Flows        : Wild Magic. Can't trapdoor!
* An Icy Passage              : May make you slip when walking/fighting.
* A Frozen Pool               : May make you slip when walking/fighting.
* An Ice-Covered Cavern       : May make you slip when walking/fighting.
* An Underground Lake         : Sleep/rest will damage you.
* A Narrow Underground Stream : Sleep/rest will damage you.
* A Deep Pool                 : Sleep/rest will damage you.
* A Wide Pool                 : Sleep/rest will damage you.
* A Deep Eddy                 : Sleep/rest will damage you.
* A Fiery Lavafall            : Damages you continously.
* A Hot Lava Flow             : Damages you continously.
* A Pool of Quicksand         : Will make you drop further down in the well.
* Most room may have trapdoors opening randomly.
* Any room may have raging tempests passing by.
* Any room with Myst is no-magic.
* Any room may be noflee, norecall and/or nosum
*
* Geyser (You can drink from it and gain random spells):
* A small geyser of glimmering water has erupted here, you feel thirsty.
* Geyser on lvl 10 gave lvl 40 blur
*
* Gond spawns at lvl 6. Moves randomly and can move down in the well but never
* up. Has been seen as deep as level 13.
* Give him a Soul Crystal to get "fused" (able to get frags).
*
* Any corpse may have frags. To get the frags, "butcher corpse"
* Frags are split among all in the group who has been fused. Leader gets a
* small bonus:
* 18 ppl, butcher =  200  (leader  218)
* 20 ppl, butcher = 1645  (leader 1810)
* 18 ppl, butcher = 3316  (leader 3616)
* Guess: Leader gets 0.5 percent extra per group member
*
* Ktv: permanent detect hidden, detect invis & darkvision, resistance to
*      gas/poison/energy/mental.
*
* Ktv   : Earth: 1600000   Water:  900000   Air:  400000   Fire: 100000
* Stat 1: Earth: 2000000   Water: 1125000   Air:  500000   Fire: 125000
* Stat 2: Earth: 2500000   Water: 1406250   Air:  635000   Fire: 156250
* Stat 3: Earth: 3125000   Water: 1757812   Air:  781250   Fire: 195312
* Stat 4: Earth: 3906250   Water: 2197265   Air:  976562   Fire: 244140
* stat 5: Earth: 4882812   Water: 2746581   Air: 1220702   Fire: 305175
*  +++  : Earth: 6103515   Water: 3433226   Air: 1525877   Fire: 381468
* RACE  : Earth: 1600000   Water:  900000   Air:  400000   Fire: 100000
* ALIGN : Earth: 1600000   Water:  900000   Air:  400000   Fire: 100000
*
* Buying stats also costs money. Not sure how it works. This is what I know.
* Sue:      strength            3392675 gold coins      27 -> 28   ( ?% disc.)
* Sue:      intelligence        2737500 gold coins      21 -> 22   ( ?% disc.)
* Sue:      wisdom              2816887 gold coins      22 -> 23   ( ?% disc.)
* Sue:      dexterity           1976475 gold coins      20 -> 21   ( ?% disc.)
* Sue:      constitution        3707031 gold coins      26 -> 27   ( ?% disc.)
* Mthead 1: strength            2400000 gold coins      26 -> 27   (36% disc.)
* Mthead 1: intelligence        1975680 gold coins      22 -> 23   (36% disc.)
* Mthead 1: wisdom              1920000 gold coins      21 -> 22   (36% disc.)
* Mthead 1: dexterity           1552320 gold coins      22 -> 23   (36% disc.)
* Mthead 1: constitution        2396160 gold coins      25 -> 26   (36% disc.)
* Mthead 2: intelligence        2739712 gold coins      22 -> 23   (45% disc.)
* Mthead 2: wisdom              2662500 gold coins      21 -> 22   (45% disc.)
* Mthead 2: dexterity           2152631 gold coins      22 -> 23   (45% disc.)
* Mthead 2: constitution        3322800 gold coins      25 -> 26   (45% disc.)


* MAP = Random but logical. Max 19 x 19 rooms per level. Map example:
* X  Entrance         ICE Ice              W  Water
* L  Lava             WM  Wild Magic       Q  Quicksand
# Lvl 1:
#                    ICE- o           o - 6 - W - o
#                     |   |              /    |
#                ICE- 5  WM - o   o           o  ICE
#                 |  /    |   |   |           |   |
#         L - o - 4   o   o -WM - o - o - o - L - o
#         |   |  /|   |   |   |       |   |
#         2   W - o - W - o   o - o   o - o
#        /    |   |   |   |       |   |
# o - o - o -WM - o - o -ICE  o - o - o
#     |           |   |   |   |   |
#     o - L - o   o - 3   o -WM   o - o
#         |   |   |  /    |
#        ICE- o - o - o   o
#         |   |   |   |   |
#         o -WM - o - o - o
#             |       |   |
#         o - X - o   o - o
#             |   |   |   |
#             1 - o  ICE  L
#            /|   |       |
#             o  WM  ICE- 9 -ICE
#             |       |  /    |
#            WM - o - o -10   o
#                 |   |  /    |
#                 8 -WM - o  WM
#                /        |   |
#                 o -ICE- o   o
#                 |   |       |
#                 7 -ICE-11 - o - o
#                /|   |  /|   |   |
#                 o   o   L - o - o
#                         |       |
#                         o       o - o
#
# Lvl 2:
#                      o   o - o   o   o -WM -ICE- o - o
#                      |   |       |       |   |   |   |    /
#                      o - o - o - o - o - W - o   o - W   6
#                          |       |   |/  |   |       |   |
#                  o   o - o -ICE  o   5   o - o - o - o - o   o -ICE
#                  |   |       |   |/      |   |  /|       |       |
#              o -WM - o   o - o - 4       o - o   L - o   o -ICE  W
#             /|   |   |   |/  |   |           |       |  /|       |
#      W - o   o - o - o - 2 - o   o   o -WM   o - o -ICE- o - W - o
#         /|           |   |  /|           |   |   |   |   |       |
# ICE- L   o   o   o - W -ICE- o - o - o -ICE-ICE- o - W - o   o   o
#      |   |   |   |       |            /  |   |   |       |   |
#      o - o   o -WM - o - L - o   o - 3 - o   o  WM -ICE-WM - o - o
#          |       |      /|   |           |   |   |           |   |
#          o - W - o  WM - o - o   o - o - o - o - L - o   o   o   o
#          |   |       |   |   |   |   |   |  /|   |   |   |   |   |
#          o - o -ICE- o - o -ICE- o - o - o -WM - o - o - o - o   o
#              |       |       |           |   |       |       |   |
#  o - o - o - L - o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o - o   o - o   W
#  |   |   |                   |/  |       |       |   |   |       |
#  o - o   o - o - o   o - L - 1   o - o - W - o - o - o -ICE  o - o
#  |       |   |   |   |       |   |   |   |/  |   |   |       |   |
#  o       o - o   o - o - o - o - o  ICE  9 - o  WM  ICE- L  WM - o
#              |               |       |   |/  |           |   |
#              o   o -ICE-ICE- o  WM - o  10 - o - o - o - o -ICE- o
#              |   |           |  /|/  |   |   |   |       |   |   |
#              o - o       o - Q - 8 - o -ICE- o - o - o -WM - o   o
#                          |   |   |       |       |   |   |   |   |
#                          o - o -WM - o - o - Q - o   W - W  WM - o
#                              |   |/      |/  |   |   |   |   |   |
#                              L - 7 - o -11 - o   o   o - o -WM - o
#                             /            |   |   |       |  /    |
#                                          o - L - o   o -WM - o - o
#                                          |  /|   |   |   |       |
#                                          o -ICE- o - o - o   o  WM
#                                          |   |       |   |   |   |
#                                          o - o      WM - o   o - o
#
* Earth  1-20    Approx lvl^2*100 drops
* Water  6-20    Approx (lvl-5)^2*100 drops
* Air    11-20   Approx (lvl-10)^2*100 drops
* Fire   16-20   Approx (lvl-15)^2*100 drops
                                                   A=Agg, I=Detect invis

# FIXME: AN OWN MAP!
*
* X = First room
* QM = QuestMaster
* a = Altar
* S = Shop
* gm = Guildmaster (practice spells/skills)
* mS = Magic shop (parchment,potions...)
* I = The Sea View Inn (rent/togg play)
* i = item store
* a = Auction Hall
* p = Post Depot
* d = Donation Chamber
* th = Trade Hall
* cs = Construction Site
* ss = Suntree square
* ns = Nature square
* lo = The Lookout
*
* ga = Guard station Alpha
* gb = Guard station Beta
* gd = Guard station Delta
* ge = Guard station Epsilon
* gg = Guard station Gamma
* go = Guard station Omega
* Area is...?
* Other useful info...?

* Whole area, except entry rooms and CoT, is norecall. Houses are also noflee.
* Forest is NOT very bright.
* Normal & Ancient Ents REMOVE a random exit in the room they are in.
* Ents are mythical. And many have armor of thorns.
* G: Grawlths
* CoT: A Circle of Trees. Recallable
